ProductsList.productname: eBerry Cute USB Hub Creative Banana Style 4-Port High Speed 480 Mbps Mini USB 2.0 Hub Splitter for Windows, Mac and Linux (4 Port Hub)
ProductsList.productdescription: The creative banana style USB 2.0 hub adds up to 4 USB peripherals quickly and easily. Especially great for notebooks which come with only a few ports in an era when you need to attach many USB devices at once, such as a printer, card reader, cell phone, iPod, thumb drive, mouse, keyboard, or an external hard drive. Achieve full 480Mbps on each port. Fully backwards compatible with the USB 1.1 products. It is an ideal gift for family and friends to add some fun to the dull office desk.
ProductsList.productfeature: Special creative banana style.Data transfer speeds up to 480 Mbps.Four downstream ports support high-speed (480Mbps), full-speed (12Mbps), and low-speed (1.5Mbps).Please Note:.For a stable connection, the devices connected to the 4-port hub must not exceed a combined current of 5 volts 500mA. External hard-drives should be connected to an external power source. This 4 Port hub will not charge an iPad (it will only sync).System Requirements:Mac OS 9.1 & higher; Windows 98SE /ME /2000 /XP /Vista /7/8/10; Linux 2.4 or above
